name: The Zombie Apocalypse : 2012
description:
This is the first release from 'The Rock & Roll Vampires' & 'Coxercise'.  The first in the trilogy from 'The Zombie Apocalypse : 2012' features a storming 10 tracks and a superb glossy booklet created by D.I.Ecast.  This is a split E.P where two genres of music collide in an explosive mix of pure listening pleasure !!!

1  -    Discovering The Relic
2  -    2012 : World War-Z  ( R&R )
3  -    The Town Was Dead  ( R&R )
4  -    When Zombies Attack !!!  ( R&R )
5  -    Strange Feeling  ( Coxercise )
6  -    Electronic Creations  ( Coxercise )
7  -    Zombies Vs Robots  ( Coxercise )
8  -    Thirst Blood  ( R&R )
9  -    Creatures !!!  ( R&R )
10  -  Thirst Blood ( Coxercise Remix )
